result.reason: External tools launched via Process.Start() lack SetForegroundWindow call, causing them to open behind mRemoteNG when RDP tabs are active — fix pattern already exists in IntegratedProgram.cs
result.approach: After Process.Start() in StartExternalProcess(), wait briefly for the process main window handle, then call NativeMethods.SetForegroundWindow() to bring the external tool to front — reusing the window-finding pattern from IntegratedProgram.cs
